mapper.select:
select m.*,m2.NAME_ from ( select ID_,PROCESS_ID_,SUBJECT_,BUSINESS_ID_,CURRENT_NODE_,CURRENT_TASK_,PROMOTER_,CREATE_DATE_,null END_DATE_ from uflo_process_instance where ID_ in ( select PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID_ from uflo_his_task
) UNION all (select PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID_ ID_,PROCESS_ID_,SUBJECT_,BUSINESS_ID_,END_NAME CURRENT_NODE_,END_NAME CURRENT_TASK_,PROMOTER_,CREATE_DATE_,END_DATE_ from uflo_his_process_instance where END_DATE_ is not null and PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID_ in ( select PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID_ from uflo_his_task ) ) )m left join uflo_process m2 on m.PROCESS_ID_ = m2.ID_ where END_DATE_ is not null
and PROCESS_ID_ in (select ID_ from uflo_process where KEY_ = #{ew.processKey})
order by m.CREATE_DATE_ desc,m2.NAME_
select count(1) from uflo_his_process_instance where BUSINESS_ID_ = #{bizId}
select count(1) from uflo_his_process_instance where BUSINESS_ID_ = #{bizId}
select process_instance_id_ from uflo_his_process_instance where BUSINESS_ID_ = #{bizId}
